location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end, on folios 24-25. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to some of the documents within the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 26; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a copy, printed in 1931, of the International Sanitary Convention signed at Paris on 21 June 1926, followed by the copy of a letter regarding the Sanitary Convention, sent from the Ministry of Health to the Foreign Office, and for information to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
